name: M13ProgressSuite
summary: A suite containing many tools to display progress information on iOS.
description: M13ProgressSuite includes many diffrent of styles of progress views: bar, ring, pie, etc. It also includes a HUD overlay and a UINavigationController with progress bar built in.
